languages.text: "Пусть однажды для вас настанут хорошие времена, и не будет нужды в песнях о борьбе с несправедливостью. А пока — радуй людей, флейтист".

traits.locale_text: "Пусть однажды для вас настанут хорошие времена, и не будет нужды в песнях о борьбе с несправедливостью. А пока — радуй людей, флейтист".

languages.text: "May good times come for you one day, and then there will be no need for songs about fighting injustice. In the meantime, strive to lift the people's spirits, flute player."
languages.original_text: "Пусть однажды для вас настанут хорошие времена, и не будет нужды в песнях о борьбе с несправедливостью. А пока — радуй людей, флейтист".

traits.locale_text: "May good times come for you one day, and then there will be no need for songs about fighting injustice. In the meantime, make the people happy, flute player."
"Every soul needs hope and solace. Even if its source is a fictitious heroic protector."
"May good times come for you one day, and then there will be no need for songs about fighting injustice. In the meantime, make the people happy, flute player."
"Every soul needs hope and solace. Even if it comes from a fictitious heroic protector."
"May good times come for you one day, and then there will be no need for songs about fighting injustice. In the meantime, strive to lift the people's spirits, flute player."
"May good times come for you one day, and then there will be no need for songs about fighting injustice. In the meantime, make the people happy, flute player."
"May good times come for you one day, and then there will be no need for songs about fighting injustice. In the meantime, make the people happy, flute player."
"May good times come for you one day, and then there will be no need for songs about fighting injustice. In the meantime, strive to lift the people's spirits, flute player."

languages.text: « Puisse votre condition s'améliorer à l'avenir, et ces chants contre l'injustice tomber en désuétude. En attendant, tâchez d'apporter un peu de réconfort à ces gens, ami flûtiste. »
languages.original_text: "May good times come for you one day, and then there will be no need for songs about fighting injustice. In the meantime, strive to lift the people's spirits, flute player."

traits.locale_text: « Puisse votre condition s'améliorer à l'avenir, et ces chants contre l'injustice tomber en désuétude. En attendant, tâchez d'apporter un peu de réconfort à ces gens, ami flûtiste. »

languages.text: «Que algún día la vida les depare buenos tiempos, y ya no se necesitarán canciones sobre luchar contra las injusticias. Hasta entonces, eleve la moral de los presentes, flautista».
languages.original_text: "May good times come for you one day, and then there will be no need for songs about fighting injustice. In the meantime, strive to lift the people's spirits, flute player."

traits.locale_text: «Que algún día la vida les depare buenos tiempos, y ya no se necesitarán canciones sobre luchar contra las injusticias. Hasta entonces, eleve la moral de los presentes, flautista».

languages.text: 「いつか、お前にも良い時代がくるといいな。そうすれば不正と戦うための歌は不要になる。その日が来るまで、皆を元気づけるよう努力することだ、フルート奏者よ」
languages.original_text: "May good times come for you one day, and then there will be no need for songs about fighting injustice. In the meantime, strive to lift the people's spirits, flute player."

traits.locale_text: 「いつか、お前にも良い時代がくるといいな。そうすれば不正と戦うための歌は不要になる。その日が来るまで、皆を元気づけるよう努力することだ、フルート奏者よ」

languages.text: “我希望有朝一日，你们所有人都能过上美好的生活。到了那个时候，你就不再需要通过歌声来反抗不公了。让大家都打起精神来吧，吹笛人。”
languages.original_text: "May good times come for you one day, and then there will be no need for songs about fighting injustice. In the meantime, strive to lift the people's spirits, flute player."

traits.locale_text: “我希望有朝一日，你们所有人都能过上美好的生活。到了那个时候，你就不再需要通过歌声来反抗不公了。让大家都打起精神来吧，吹笛人。”

languages.text: "Mögen Euch eines Tages gute Zeiten ereilen, dann werden wir keine Lieder über den Kampf gegen das Unrecht mehr brauchen. Bis dahin, erfreut die Leute mit Eurer Musik, Flötenspieler."
languages.original_text: "May good times come for you one day, and then there will be no need for songs about fighting injustice. In the meantime, strive to lift the people's spirits, flute player."

traits.locale_text: "Mögen Euch eines Tages gute Zeiten ereilen, dann werden wir keine Lieder über den Kampf gegen das Unrecht mehr brauchen. Bis dahin, erfreut die Leute mit Eurer Musik, Flötenspieler."

languages.text: "Bir gün tüm iyilikler seni bulsun. İşte o günlerde adaletsizlikle savaşmaya dair şarkılara artık ihtiyaç kalmasın. Bu esnada insanları mutlu etmeyi çalış flütçü."
languages.original_text: "May good times come for you one day, and then there will be no need for songs about fighting injustice. In the meantime, strive to lift the people's spirits, flute player."

traits.locale_text: "Bir gün tüm iyilikler seni bulsun. İşte o günlerde adaletsizlikle savaşmaya dair şarkılara artık ihtiyaç kalmasın. Bu esnada insanları mutlu etmeyi çalış flütçü."
